channel.title: How do you add more xp Per Hit. [help please]
channel.description: How do u make it so you get more xp when you attack something.

item.title: How do you add more xp Per Hit. [help please]
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

Go into your client.java
Search for hitdif
Once found, look for something along the lines of Fight type, after that there should be a numer like
145 or whatever your current XP rate is, just change that number.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you add more xp Per Hit. [help please]

item.title: How do you add more xp Per Hit. [help please]
item.dc:creator: @newb_pk3r newb pk3r
item.description:
@newb_pk3r wrote:

[quote=“krazy karl, post:2, topic:274412”]Go into client.java and search

hitdif

From there you should change the xp given next to Fighttype[/quote]

Its confuseing can you be a bit more specific?

Read full topic
